146800.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は あと<%nM_LEFT_SLIME>回:
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> can be re-trained <%nM_LEFT_SLIME> more times... If you do, your race will be changed, and your strength,
skill, and race participation will be reset to their initial state. Your victory points will also be reset, but don't worry, your
personal bests from the past will still be recorded... Would you like to reconfigure your <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> and participate in
the race from scratch?

146801.「かしこまりました！\n さっそく <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を 呼ん:
Yes, sir! I'll go call <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>
right away! Hey! <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> Your
husband wants to see you!<end>

146802.<speed=0>\n予期せぬエラーが 発生しました。\n時間をおいて 再度 お:
<speed=0>I'm getting an unexpected error. Please give
it some time and try again.<end>

146803.<speed=0>\n申し訳ありませんが\nその名前は 入力できません。\n<e: <speed=0>I'm sorry, sir. I can't enter that name.<end>

146804.「ちゃんと 名前をつけてあげてくださいね！\n<bw_break>: Just make sure you name them properly!<bw_break>

146805.スライムレースに出場する\n<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>が 仲間になった:
The Slime Races participant
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> joined your party!
<me 61><end>

146806.「今大会で 育てられるスライムは\n <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>で 最:
Please note that <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> will be
the last slime you can grow in this
tournament... Now then...<bw_break>

146807.「今大会は <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>の他に\n あと <%nM_LE:
In this tournament, in addition to
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>, I can raise another
<%nM_LEFT_SLIME> slime... So...<bw_break>

146808.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を このすがたに\n きたえなおして よろ:
Can I reformat <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> to this
form?<yesno><break>

146809.<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は 引退を告げられ\n悔しそうに レース場に:
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> returned to the racetrack,
disappointed to be told he was retiring...<bw_break>

146810.「育てたいスライムの 種族とカラーを\n 選択してください。\n<break>:
Select the race and color of the slime you
want to grow.<break>

146811.「育てるスライムは この子でよろしいですか？\n<yesno><break>:
Are you sure this is the right slime to
raise?<yesno><break>

147140.「そうですか……。レースは\n <%nM_CLOSE_MONTH>月<%nM_C:
Oh, well... The race will be open until <%nM_CLOSE_MONTH> Monday <%nM_CLOSE_DAY> Sunday, so we're looking forward to seeing
you again!

147141.「あら？ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は すでに何度も\n きたえなおさ:
What? <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> has already been re-
scaled many times... I'm sorry, but I can't
resize it any more...<bw_break>

147142.「どの子を育てるか まだ決めていませんが\n 決定内容をキャンセルしても よろし:
I haven't decided which child to raise yet,
but would you mind if I cancel my decision?<yesno2><break>

151028.「かしこまりました！ それでは\n <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を きた:
Yes, sir! Now, let's get <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>
back in shape. If we feed him this
regenerating grass...<end>

151029.……なんと！ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n<%sM_race>種の:
... Oh my! <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> has been
reconditioned to the <%sM_race> species'
<%sM_color> color!<me 61><end>

151030.「きたえなおした後の すがたを\n まだ決めていませんが\n 決定内容をキャンセ:
I haven't decided what I'm going to look like
after reshaping, but can I cancel my
decision?<yesno2><break>

151031.「それでは <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を どのすがたに\n きたえなお:
Now decide what form you want
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> to take...<break>

151446.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n「育てたいスライムの 種族とカラー:
<pipipi_off><speed=0>Select the race and color of the slime you
want to grow.<break>

151447.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n「それでは <%sM_ACTIVE:
<pipipi_off><speed=0>Now decide what form you want
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> to take...<break>

151448.<speed=0>\n予期せぬエラーが 発生しました。\n時間をおいて 再度 お:
<speed=0>I'm getting an unexpected error. Please give
it some time and try again.<end>

151449.<speed=0>\n予期せぬエラーが 発生しました。\n時間をおいて 再度 お:
<speed=0>I'm getting an unexpected error. Please give
it some time and try again.<end>

151555.「きたえなおしはじめると 前の状態には\n 二度と 戻ることができません。\n:
Once you start to reshape it, you'll never be
able to go back to the way it was... Are you
sure you want to do this?<yesno2><break>

183543.「かしこまりました。\n ……おや。<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は みご:
Yes, sir... ..... <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> has successfully made it to the Championship... You can make <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> try again
from the Championship with the same strength as before... If he retries, his victory points and race entry will be restored to
what they were when he reached the Championship... <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>'s victory points for reaching the Championship will be
<%nM_AGAIN_POINT> points...

183544.「では <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を\n はじめの状態から きたえなお:
So, do you want to rerun <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>
from its initial state?<yesno2><break>

183545.「それでは <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>の勝利ポイントを\n チャンピオ:
I'll restore the <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> victory points to the state they were in when you reached the Championship, and give them to
you here!

183769.「では <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を 種族を変更せず\n 今と同じつよ:
So, let's retry <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> from the Championship with the same strength as before, but without changing your race. If
you retry, you'll get one less re-training... Are you sure you want to do this?

191159.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は あと<%nM_LEFT_SLIME>回:
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> can be re-tried
<%nM_LEFT_SLIME> times... How do I re-run it?
<select_se_off>
Same strength as now
From the initial state
in a state of restlessness
<select_end>
